scenario: In 2019, Heidi realized a capital gain of $272,442.43 and invested the entire amount into a Qualified Opportunity Fund (QOF), making a valid election to defer the gain under Section 1400Z-2. Heidi holds the QOF investment for 7 years.
question: Calculate Heidi's adjusted basis in the QOF investment after the 7-year holding period, accounting for any basis adjustments under Section 1400Z-2(b)(2)(B).
answer_explanation: The basis is increased by 15% of the deferred gain due to the 7-year holding period. Adjusted Basis = $0 + ($272,442.43 * 0.15000000000000002) = $40,866.36.
